revision.text:
[[File:Dock Example.png|thumb|200px|Above: The Johto Dock on the Town Map
Below: The Travel Menu as seen from the Hoenn Dock]][[File:Travel Menu Example.png|thumb|200px]] '''Docks''' are locations that allow travel to other [[Regions]]. They can be used upon reaching the city they are located in. The only exception to this rule is the [[Kanto]] Dock, which is only unlocked once the [[Johto]] Dock is unlocked so as to allow travel between the two regions. ==Locations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Regions|Region]] !! Dock Location (Closest Routes) |- | [[Kanto]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] (between Routes 6, 11) |- | [[Johto]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] (between Routes 39, 40) |- | [[Hoenn]] || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] (intersection of Routes 109, 110, 134) |- | [[Sinnoh]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] (Route 218) |- | [[Unova]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] (between Route 4 and Skyarrow Bridge) |- | [[Kalos]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Coumarine City]] (intersection of Routes 12, 13, A.B. |- | [[Alola]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Hau'oli City]] (between Route 1 Hau'oli Outskirst and Route 2) |}
